title: Parisian Fashion [Le Mode Parisiennes]
description: Three designs for parasols.  Top center: Black and gray lace patterned parasol.  Left center:  blue parasol with a floral garland pattern on a scalloped white strip.  White trim along the bottom and the 2nd tier.  Right center: lilac parasol with white lace trim.  At top white circle with a floral garland within.
name: Print
